document.full_text: a few blocks from broadway, louisville has been cast in the role of spoiler recently at the big east tournament. and with connecticut becoming the toast of the town over the past week, the cardinals found themselves a part of a familiar story line.
document.title: miscues cost louisville the chance to play spoiler
lines_and_colors: a few blocks from broadway, louisville has been cast in the role of spoiler recently at the big east tournament. and with connecticut becoming the toast of the town over the past week, the cardinals found themselves a part of a familiar story line.
